APPLICATIONS ARE NOW OPEN
GIFS – ACADEMIC PROGRAM

The Graduate Institute of Financial Sciences aims to provide 20 qualifying learners with the opportunity to participate in the 12-month NQF Level 5 Learnership based in Irene, Pretoria and Bryanston, Sandton.

CRITERIA – NON-NEGOTIABLE
Age: 18 – 28 years’ old
Must live in Bryanston surrounding area
Must be able to travel to Irene, Pretoria
SA citizen with Clear credit & Criminal records.
Passed Matric with C Aggregate
MUST have passed Math or Math Literacy
Must be unemployed and NOT studying full time
Good English comprehension skills
Must live with family who can support you financially for the duration of the learnership
Monthly Stipend = SA Min Wage rate (R5 000 – R6 000)
Starts on 01 October 2024

Apply via the link: https://forms.gle/zjy6f5jF9TinUZxh8
Application deadline: Monday, 16 September 2024
